# General information

On this website we present our ongoing ambition to quantify anthropogenic CO~2~ in the ocean based on observations.

Navigate trough the navbar on top to take a look at the various chapters of this project.
The links in the upper right corner bring you to the source code of this project and to Jens' homepage.  

# Nomenclature

## Variables

Original variable names from source data files are maintained to the highest degree possible. When required for merging, following variable names were used:

- lat
- lon
- depth

## Data sets / objects

## Chunk labels

- read_xxx: open new data set
- set_criteria_xxx: definition of subsetting criteria, thresholds, grids, etc
- clean_xxx: subset rows of a data set
- write_xxx: write summarized data file to disk

## Folder structure

- data: contains all data, not synced to Github
  - subfolder for each data product
    - _summarized_data_files: data sets created along analysis
